snippet.title: Alliance of the Sacred Suns - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Take the role of the newly crowned ruler of an interstellar empire on the brink of collapse in the 4X / grand strategy / RPG sim game Alliance of the Sacred Suns. Unite the feuding noble houses, protect your people against invasion, and revive the glory of your fading empire.  Coming in 2022 to PC & Mac.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
